document_data.name: The Black Bow
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Bow''' was a [[bow]] from the ancient [[Imaskari Empire]]. As of {{yearlink|1360}}, it might be found within the [[Solon#Star Houses|Star Houses]] of Solon.{{cite book/Blood Charge|55}}
document_data.Powers: This bow always struck true at any target within a mile, and always dealt the harshest possible wound. However, it drained its wielder's health with each arrow launched.
